globalToastViewport.description: Radix toast viewport used in dashboard/popup contexts; intentionally low to avoid covering onboarding overlays.

shadowOverlayHost.description: Fixed container injected into inspected pages; all EyeNote overlay UI renders inside this root.

highlightOverlay.description: Highlight rectangles and cursor guides that should sit above the inspected DOM but below actionable UI.

cursor.description: Custom cursor indicator that mirrors the highlight overlay depth.

noteMarker.description: Pinned note markers and floating affordances that must receive pointer events over highlights.

interactionShield.description: Full-screen interaction blocker used while inspector modes are active.

panel.description: Side panels, sheets, and contextual editors that open beside the inspected page.

dialogOverlay.description: Modal scrims that must sit at the absolute top of the overlay stack.

dialogContent.description: Modal content, note sheets, and dialogs that should never be occluded.

shadowToastViewport.description: Toast viewport rendered inside the overlay shadow root; aligns with other actionable UI layers.
